member.name: M:EPPlus.ExcelReader.ExcelFile.Read(System.IO.FileInfo,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Reads the entire content of an excel sheet.
member.param: the sheet's name as a string
reads the data by columns(default) or by rows
you can limit the content you'd like to read, by providing a valid excel address range, such as "A1:C5"

member.name: M:EPPlus.ExcelReader.ExcelFile.SheetNames(System.IO.FileInfo)
member.summary: Gets all of the sheet names stored in this excel workbook file.

member.name: M:EPPlus.ExcelReader.ExcelFile.NamedRanges(System.IO.FileInfo,System.String)
member.summary: Gets all of the named ranges stored in an excel file. If the worksheet parameter is blank, only ranges registered in the workbook will be fetched.
member.param: the name of the sheet as a string

member.name: T:EPPlus.ExcelReader.NamedRange
member.summary: A placeholder class used to display named ranges nicely in Dynamo

member.name: M:EPPlus.ExcelReader.NamedRange.GetRangeAddress
member.summary: fetches the address of a range as a basic string
